cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on April 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2543, Federal Reserve Racial and Economic Equity Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 64 (Wednesday, April 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 2543.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 cl. 3, To regulate Commerce with
Foreign Nations, Among the Several States, and with the
Indian Tribes
[Page H1791]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Federal Reserve Racial and Economic Equity Act
